short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays System Information in Floating Panels

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This app consists of customizable floating panels displaying memory, processor, and battery usage. It is best used together with Memory, Processor, and Battery Monitor extensions. This functionality cannot be included with the main extensions due to Google's distinction between platform apps and browser extensions.
